name: IP2Location.io IP Geolocation API
description: IP2Location.io IP Geolocation API provides RESTful API to obtain visitors’ geolocation information such as country, region, district, city, latitude & longitude, ZIP code, time zone, ASN, ISP, domain, net speed, IDD code, area code, weather station data, MNC, MCC, mobile brand, elevation, usage type, address type, advertisement category, ASN, IP2Proxy fraud score and proxy data with an IP address.
